The *Newsletter* portlet is used to help users quickly get the updated newsletter from a site.

This is an example of the *Newsletter* portlet used in eXo Content:

!images/newsletter-portlet.png|align="center"!

* *Packaging*: This portlet is packaged in the _newsletter.war_ file.

* *The portlet class name*: _org.exoplatform.wcm.webui.newsletter.manager.UINewsletterManagerPortlet_
